nodes.documentation: @return The amount of SNX mintable for the inflationary supply
nodes.name: mintableSupply

nodes.documentation:
@return A unit amount of decaying inflationary supply from the INITIAL_WEEKLY_SUPPLY
@dev New token supply reduces by the decay rate each week calculated as supply = INITIAL_WEEKLY_SUPPLY * ()
nodes.name: tokenDecaySupplyForWeek

nodes.documentation:
@return A unit amount of terminal inflation supply
@dev Weekly compound rate based on number of weeks
nodes.name: terminalInflationSupply

nodes.documentation:
@dev Take timeDiff in seconds (Dividend) and MINT_PERIOD_DURATION as (Divisor)
@return Calculate the numberOfWeeks since last mint rounded down to 1 week
nodes.name: weeksSinceLastIssuance

nodes.name: onlySynthetix

nodes.documentation: @notice Emitted when the inflationary supply is minted
nodes.name: SupplyMinted

isMintable().return: boolean whether the MINT_PERIOD_DURATION (7 days) has passed since the lastMintEvent.

mintableSupply().return: The amount of SNX mintable for the inflationary supply

params.supplyMinted: the amount of SNX the total supply was inflated by.

params.amount: the amount of SNX to reward the minter.

terminalInflationSupply(uint256,uint256).details: Weekly compound rate based on number of weeks
terminalInflationSupply(uint256,uint256).return: A unit amount of terminal inflation supply

tokenDecaySupplyForWeek(uint256).details: New token supply reduces by the decay rate each week calculated as supply = INITIAL_WEEKLY_SUPPLY * ()
tokenDecaySupplyForWeek(uint256).return: A unit amount of decaying inflationary supply from the INITIAL_WEEKLY_SUPPLY

weeksSinceLastIssuance().details: Take timeDiff in seconds (Dividend) and MINT_PERIOD_DURATION as (Divisor)
weeksSinceLastIssuance().return: Calculate the numberOfWeeks since last mint rounded down to 1 week

recordMintEvent(uint256).notice: Record the mint event from Synthetix by incrementing the inflation week counter for the number of weeks minted (probabaly always 1) and store the time of the event.

setMinterReward(uint256).notice: Sets the reward amount of SNX for the caller of the public function Synthetix.mint(). This incentivises anyone to mint the inflationary supply and the mintr Reward will be deducted from the inflationary supply and sent to the caller.

setSynthetixProxy(address).notice: Set the SynthetixProxy should it ever change. SupplySchedule requires Synthetix address as it has the authority to record mint event.
